@pb185

When you use DVD-R discs the Wii can only read them at 3x speed compared to it reading original game discs at 6x, hence why you are finding loading times longer. 
USB loading is the way to go, as USB drive playback speeds of games exceed the standard 6x of genuine game disc speeds.
Some games glitch or have speed issues with DVD-R discs.
